SecureAuthServer.SecureAuthServer

Class HCAPAuthorizationServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • SecureAuthServer.SecureAuthServer.HCAPAuthorizationServer

  • public class HCAPAuthorizationServer
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains all the necessary operations to configure and start the authorization server.
    Author:
    lakshya.tandon
